"Welcome to the Pika- Seeker Game!
" "There are many pikachu playing "hide and seek " in the cell. Our mission is to try finding all of them by openning the cell. Once you open the empty cell, the scan is activated, showing the number of pikachu hiding in the row and column Try to get the least amount of scans while locating all the pikachu to win the game! Good luck!"
